}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Atmel]]'' ATSAMA5D44 :@528MHz (ARM Cortex A5) *Memory: 512MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 512MB NAND, :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Video Output: HDMI 1.4a or TFT LCD *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x Micro USB Device *Power Source: 5V 2A via microUSB
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/01/19/atmel-sama5d4-xplained-ultra-development-board-adds-hdmi-720p-video-decoding/ ''Atmel SAMA5D4 Xplained Ultra Development Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/low-cost-cortex-a5-dev-board-accepts-arduino-shields/ ''Sub-$100 Cortex-A5 dev board accepts Arduino shields'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.linux4sam.org/bin/view/Linux4SAM/Sama5d4XplainedMainPage ''SAMA5D4 Xplained Board'' on '''Linux & Open Source for AT91 Microchip Microprocessors''']
